            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        
                        $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_login' );
                        if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
                        
                        if( $this->UserAlgorithms->logged_in() === true )
                        {
                              $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_logout' );
                              if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
                        }
                        
                        $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_update_user' );
                        if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
                        
                        $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_activate_user' );
                        if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
                        
                        $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_registration_form' );

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $User = $this->UserAccess->get_user( $UserLogin );
                                          
                        if( $this->UserAlgorithms->user_banned( $UserLogin ) )
                        {
                              $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'user_is_banned_to '.$User->banned_to );
                              return;
                        }
                        
                        $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        
                        $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_before_login' , array( 'id' => get_field( $User , 'id' ) ) );
                        
                        $this->UserAlgorithms->login( $UserLogin , get_field( $User , 'id' ) );
                        
                        $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_login' , array( 'id' => get_field( $User , 'id' ) ) );
                        
                        $this->redirect_after_login( $Options );
                  }

login ( $  Options  ) 

Function logins user.

Parameters:
$Options - Settings.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 376 of file user_controller.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $UserLogin = $this->Security->get_gp( 'login' , 'string' );
                        $UserPassword = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' );
                        
                        $UserExists = $this->UserAlgorithms->user_exists( $UserLogin );
                        $UserActive = $AuthValid = true;
                        
                        if( $UserExists )
                        {
                              $UserActive = $this->UserAlgorithms->user_active( $UserLogin );
                        
                              if( $UserActive )
                              {
                                    $AuthValid = $this->UserAccess->validate_auth( $UserLogin , $UserPassword );
                                    
                                    if( $AuthValid )
                                    {
                                          $this->do_login( $UserLogin , $Options );
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->process_login_errors( $UserExists , $UserActive , $AuthValid );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 184 of file user_controller.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'redirect_after_login' , false ) )
                        {
                              $RedirectPage = $Options->get_setting( 'redirect_page' , false );
                              
                              if( $RedirectPage === false )
                              {
                                    $Settings= get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                                    $Settings->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_user_controller' );
                                    
                                    $RequestUri = $this->Security->get_srv( 'REQUEST_URI' , 'string' );
                                    
                                    $RedirectPage = $Settings->get_setting( 'redirect_page' , $RequestUri );
                              }
                              
                              header( 'Location: '.$RedirectPage );
                              exit( 0 );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

register_user ( $  Options  ) 

Function registers user.

Parameters:
$Options - Settings.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

user does not exists or inactive

no the same emails

~ Нужно ли подтверждение ~ Confirm registration?

~ Создаем письмо подтверждения регистрации ~ Creating email wich allows user to confirm registration

~ Активируем сразу ~ Instant activation

Definition at line 552 of file user_controller.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->EnableRegistration === 1 || 
                              $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'user_manager' ) )
                        {
                              $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $UserLogin        = $this->Security->get_gp( 'login' , 'string' );
                              $UserEmail        = $this->Security->get_gp( 'email' , 'string' );
                              $UserPassword     = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' );
                              $Name                   = $this->Security->get_gp( 'name' , 'string' );
                              $Sex              = $this->Security->get_gp( 'sex' , 'integer' );
                              $Site                   = $this->Security->get_gp( 'site' , 'string' , '' );
                              $About                  = $this->Security->get_gp( 'about' , 'string' , '' );
                              
                              if( $this->UserAlgorithms->user_exists( $UserLogin ) )
                              {
                                    $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'user_already_exists' );
                                    return;
                              }
                              
                              if( $this->UserAccess->email_exists( $UserEmail ) )
                              {
                                    $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'email_already_exists' );
                                    return;
                              }
                              
                              $PermitAccess = get_package( 'permit::permit_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $ActivationHash = $this->UserAccess->register_user( 
                                    $UserLogin , $UserPassword , $UserEmail , $Name , $Sex , $Site , $About
                              );
                              $User = $this->UserAccess->get_user( $UserLogin );
                              $PermitAccess->add_permit_for_object( 'public' , get_field( $User , 'id' ) , 'user' );
                              $PermitAccess->add_permit_for_object( 'registered' , get_field( $User , 'id' ) , 'user' );
                              $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              
                              if( $this->RegistrationConfirm && 
                                    $this->Security->get_p( 'active_permanently' , 'command' , false ) !== 'on' )
                              {
                                    $EmailTemplate = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'confirm_registration_email.tpl' );
                                    $EmailTemplate = str_replace( 
                                          '{server_name}' , $this->Security->get_srv( 'SERVER_NAME' , 'string' , 'localhost' ) , 
                                          $EmailTemplate
                                    );
                                    $EmailTemplate = str_replace( 
                                          '{http_host}' , $this->Security->get_srv( 'HTTP_HOST' , 'string' , '127.0.0.1' ) , 
                                          $EmailTemplate 
                                    );
                                    $EmailTemplate = str_replace( '{hash}' , $ActivationHash , $EmailTemplate );
                                    $EmailTemplate = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( $EmailTemplate , 'post_process' );
                                    $Headers  = 'MIME-Version: 1.0'."\r\n";
                                    $Headers .= 'Content-type: text/html; charset=utf-8'."\r\n";
                                    $Headers .= 'From: '.$this->EmailSender.' <'.$this->SystemEmail.'>'."\r\n";

                                    mail( 
                                          $this->Security->get_gp( 'email' , 'string' ) , 'Confirm registration' , 
                                          $EmailTemplate , $Headers
                                    );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $this->UserAccess->activate_user( $ActivationHash );
                                    $this->RegistrationConfirm = false;
                              }
                              
                              $this->RegistrationWasPassed = true;
                              
                              $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_register_user' , array( 'login' => $UserLogin ) );
                              
                              if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'back_page' , 'command' , false ) !== false )
                              {
                                    $this->Security->reset_s( 'success_message' , 'user_was_created' );
                                    header( "HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently" );
                                    header( "Location: ./".$this->Security->get_gp( 'back_page' , 'command' ).'.html' );
                              }
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 665 of file user_controller.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $FileInputController = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_controller' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        
                        if( $FileInputController->UploadedFile )
                        {
                              $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
                              
                              $Avatar = get_field( $User , 'avatar' );
                              if( $Avatar > 0 )
                              {
                                    $FileInputAccess = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                                    $FileInputAccess->delete( $Avatar );
                              }
                              
                              $Login = get_field( $User , 'login' );
                              $FileId = get_field( $FileInputController->UploadedFile , 'id' );
                              $this->UserAccess->set_avatar( $Login , $FileId );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

update_user ( $  Options  ) 

Function updates user.

Parameters:
$Options - Settings.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 496 of file user_controller.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
                        
                        $Login = get_field( $User , 'login' );
                        $UserEmail = $this->Security->get_gp( 'email' , 'email' );
                        $Site = $this->Security->get_gp( 'site' , 'string' , '' );
                        $About = $this->Security->get_gp( 'about' , 'string' , '' );
                        
                        $this->UserAccess->update_user( $Login , $UserEmail , $Site , $About );
                        
                        if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'current_password' , 'set' ) )
                        {
                              $CurrentPassword = $this->Security->get_gp( 'current_password' , 'string' );
                              if( strlen( $CurrentPassword ) )
                              {
                                    if( $this->UserAccess->validate_auth( $Login , $CurrentPassword ) )
                                    {
                                          $Password = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' );
                                          $PasswordConfirmation = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password_confirmation' , 'string' );
                                          if( $Password == $PasswordConfirmation )
                                          {
                                                $this->UserAccess->reset_password( $Login , $Password );
                                          }
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->PageComposer->add_success_message( 'user_update_was_completed' );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
